tool.name: The converter for mzQuantML files
tool.description: Convert the mzQuantML file into more widely-used formats, e.g. CSV

param.name: mzq
param.label: the mzQuantML file
param.help: The mzQuantML file to be converted

param.name: type
param.label: the output file format
param.help: The format to which the mzQuantML will be converted

tool.help: mzq-lib (https://code.google.com/p/mzq-lib/) is a Java library to process the quantitation PSI standard file format mzQuantML. This tool uses the Java library to convert mzQuantML files into various other common formats.
